summary: Replaces all the textures of old male NPCs with with the textures of young men.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][u]DESCRIPTION[/u][/b]

This mod replaces all the facial, body, and hand textures of all old male NPCs in the game with younger ones.  Textures were taken with permission from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?]Better Males[/url].

It's nothing fancy.  ONE FACE replaces the face of every single old man in the game so if you're looking for some texture mod that'll super blow you away, this...is not it.

I made it because, well, the textures for old people in this game are frankly AWFUL.  They are basically the same as in the Fallout games, but the texture & wrinkles fit in well with the weatherbeaten/fcked up look of those particular games (especially Fallout New Vegas which I loved.  I can well imagine that the characters would look like that after toiling on a farm under the Mojave sun for a long time).  I felt like they didn't belong in Skyrim though.

[b][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/b]

[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Back up [font=Courier New]INSTALLPATH\Skyrim\Data\textures\actors\character\male[/font] and [/size]
[font=Courier New][size=3]INSTALLPATH\Skyrim\Data\textures\actors\character\maleold[/size][/font][*][size=3]Manually download and unzip the mod.[/size]
[*][size=3]Drag the [font=Courier New]Textures[/font] folder into [font=Courier New]Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data[/font]. Overwrite everything when asked.[/size]
[/list][size=3] 
If you are using Steam, INSTALLPATH is usually something like [font=Courier New]C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common[/font] or something like that.

[b][u]UNINSTALLATION[/u][/b]

[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Find your original backups of the [font=Courier New]male [/font]and [font=Courier New]maleold[/font] folders.[/size]
[*][size=3]Drag into [font=Courier New]INSTALLPATH\Skyrim\Data\textures\actors\character[/font]. Overwrite everything when asked.[/size]
[/list][size=3] 
[b][u]UPDATES[/u][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65546/?tab=12&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodchangelog%2F%3Fid%3D65546%26v%3D&pUp=1]Here[/url].

[b][u]FUTURE PLANS
[/u][/b]
I'll get around to making an NMM/FOMM installer file for it eventually.

[b][u]CREDITS[/u][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/]Better Males[/url] by Chris57 & FavoredSoul, specifically Geonox/Chris57/mrLenski's "Faces - YoungerFacesMergedWithMenByGeonox" and Xenius' "Nudes - FavoredSoulMeshes - ErectVersion" packages.

[b][u]OTHER MODS YOU MAY WANT TO TRY[/u][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28301/?]No More Old Women[/url].  This was created back in 2012 so it's about time there was one for men.[/size]
author: Shadintie
